verses.name: Luke 12:12
verses.text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say.

verses.name: Luke 12:13
verses.text: And one of the company said unto him, Master, speak to my brother, that he divide the inheritance with me.

verses.name: Luke 12:14
verses.text: And he said unto him, Man, who made me a judge or a divider over you?

verses.name: Luke 12:15
verses.text: And he said unto them, Take heed, and beware of covetousness: for a man’s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.

verses.name: Luke 12:16
verses.text: And he spake a parable unto them, saying, The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully:
